original_text: Then God said, ‘Put your hand back inside your robe again.’ So Moses did that. And when he took his hand out, it was well again, like the rest of his skin!
korean_text: 이르시되 네 손을 다시 품에 넣으라 하시매 그가 다시 손을 품에 넣었다가 내어보니 그의 손이 본래의 살로 되돌아왔더라

sentences.original_text: Put your hand back inside your robe again
sentences.korean_translation: 네 손을 다시 네 옷 안으로 넣으라

sentences.original_text: And when he took his hand out
like the rest of his skin
